title: I want to contact Asma Badawi, who translates dreams

preview.html: Asmaa Badawi is a reliable interpreter of dreams. Asmaa Badawi is a dream translator trusted by many who are interested in interpreting their dreams and visions. “Interpret your dream” to obtain accurate information as quickly as possible over the Internet without wasting time and energy between personal interviews and phone calls. This confusion will end after today when you have the comprehensive “Interpret Your Dream” application, through which you communicate with a team of senior expert scholars, ensuring that you get Real information. Once you download the application to your device and subscribe to one of its distinctive 24-hour packages, you will enjoy its full services in terms of speed of performance and quality of response. You can also get the opinion of Asma Badawi, your dream translator, and well-known interpreters by entering the articles section in the application For free and see the interpretation of any world you prefer. Rather, you will find in your hands the most effective and guaranteed alternative for continuous exchange of knowledge. Dear reader, enter the application “Interpret Your Dream” Then write the dream in a message and press the “Send” button, and a scholar will receive it and respond to it in detail and explain what you want. Then, with the click of a button, you You go inside the app and pour everything on your mind into a text message, then sit back until a notification pops up on your phone with a message with all the details. If the phone number of the interpreter whom Asmaa Salem dreams about is busy, but time does not allow you to wait any longer, use quick technical means to find out the information. Request “Interpret Your Dream.” It is one of the technical sources that guarantees its users the highest standards of accuracy and reliability in Manage and display the information and it will not be exploited in any way. The translator distinguishes between a dream and a vision, and the type under which your dream falls, so that you have sufficient awareness of the matter when contacting Asmaa Badawi, the dream translator or otherwise. title: Interpretation of a dream when you see yourself walking in the street

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about walking on the road in a dream: This indicates achieving goals and achieving a wonderful future, and this is if the road is easy and there are no obstacles. Today, especially for those who work, it is quite normal, but the interpretation of a dream about walking on the street in a dream will certainly have a meaning, and perhaps a warning and an indication of something that is likely to happen. Next, we learn the opinions of Arab scholars and translators about seeing walking on the street in a dream In detail.Interpretation of the dream of walking on the road by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the vision of walking on the street in a dream indicates that it indicates the disappearance of anxiety and almost comfort, especially if the dreamer is barefoot. Seeing yourself walking on the street in a dream also indicates that the person He is one of the righteous people, who wants to preserve his religion. If a person sees in his dream that he is walking in the street and he is on a road that he knows in his dream, this indicates that the person has a certain goal that he seeks and is already on the verge of reaching it. No. Because whoever sees in his dream that he is walking on the road and it is dark and he does not know him, then his vision shows that the goal he tried to reach will be achieved, but he did not gain from it. As for the one who sees in his dreams that he is walking in a narrow corridor, his vision indicates that A person suffers from anxiety about something. For those who see in their dreams that they are walking alone in the street, this vision indicates that the dreamer is living his life as he wants and does not care about others. For those who see in their dreams that they are walking in the opposite direction of people, his vision shows that he is entering into Competing and challenging others. See also: Interpretation of a dream of seeing walking in a dream Interpretation of a vision of walking on the road to Nabulsi In his interpretation of the dream of walking on the street, Imam Al-Nabulsi said that walking in a dream generally indicates a person’s endeavor to earn a living. Likewise, whoever sees in his dreams that he is walking on the road with joy, then Seeing him shows his good work. Interpretation of a dream about walking in the market: Seeing a dreamer walking in the market means that there is someone conveying a message to him and wanting to deliver it. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing walking in the mud in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about walking in the street with a crutch. A time when he sees himself walking on crutches or legs. Wooden sign is a sign of his confusion and anxiety. Some scholars also interpreted the vision of walking with a stick as a sign of the coming of livelihood, goodness, and success. Read also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a running race in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of walking in the street with someone. Seeing someone in a dream walking with someone he knows indicates his cooperation with this person. The person. As for seeing a dreamer walking with someone he does not know, this indicates the dreamer’s feeling of depression and anxiety. To see yourself walking with one of his family members in the street, this is a sign of the optimism and hope that the dreamer feels. Interpretation of a dream of walking a long road alone: ​​Seeing yourself walking in A long road promises the fulfillment of many dreams and desires. And many achievements achieved by the dreamer. A long road or road for individuals may indicate a late marriage age. Interpretation of a dream about walking on a long road for a divorced woman

title: Interpretation of a dream about someone I know kissing me

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about someone I know kissing me: Kissing in a dream has excellent interpretations in general, and cases vary depending on the condition of the dreamer of this dream. We mention some of the interpretations of a dream about someone I know kissing me as follows: Dreams of a kiss from a well-known and famous person indicate the friendship and love that unites these two people. Kissing in general indicates marriage or engagement in romantic relationships. A kiss from a well-known and famous person indicates the love that unites the two people who They exchange kisses. The Nabulsi scholar says that kissing in a dream is a symbol of getting rid of enemies and victory over them. A man’s dream of accepting someone like him shows the intense love in that person’s soul towards the person he kisses. A man kissing a woman shows his desire to marry her. But if she kisses the dead in a dream As we mentioned, each part in which the dream is explained has a specific interpretation: Seeing a married woman being kissed on the cheek, and the man was handsome, indicates that she heard happy news that makes her very happy. Likewise, a kiss on the cheek of a woman married to an evil man symbolizes illness, neglect, and sadness. Also, the interpretation of a dream about a kiss on the cheek of a pregnant woman is good news. An easy birth and a healthy child. Also, the dream of kissing an unmarried woman on the cheek portends her marriage soon. We chose for you: Interpretation of a dream about a kiss in a dream by Ibn Sirin. What does kissing symbolize in a dream? Kissing in a dream shows many signs, symbols and interpretations, and we can mention them below: If one sees Some people kiss in a dream, which means that some people kiss each other in a dream. That the fortuneteller interferes a lot in matters that do not concern him or her, and that he occupies his thoughts a lot with others. Seeing the sleeper kissing his wife in a dream, this indicates the intensity of his love for her and his great attachment. With it. Seeing a kiss on the cheeks in a dream is a sign of affection, tenderness and passion. When you dream of kissing someone you know, the dream is interpreted by your efforts to get closer to this person. And seeing you kissing him in a dream for hostility towards you, the dream portends the end of this hostility soon and the emergence of peace between you Interpretation of dreams about someone I know kissing me on the mouth. One of the places where kissing is common in a dream is the mouth, and it has an independent interpretation, which is: A kiss on the mouth in a dream symbolizes a lot of money that the dreamer gets. Kissing a girl on the mouth indicates that the fortuneteller has drunk a lot of water. Alcohol. Dreaming of a kiss on the mouth of the world is evidence that he always recites the Qur’an. Dreaming of kissing a woman on the mouth who was beautiful symbolizes marrying a widow and benefiting her in money and children. Also, kissing a woman on the mouth without desire indicates that her advice is always taken advantage of. Interpretation A dream about someone I know kissing me as a single woman. In interpreting a dream about someone I know kissing me as a single woman, there are several cases, including: If the girl loves this person, this indicates her strong desire to marry this person. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that someone from Her relatives or acquaintances

title: What is the interpretation of seeing the whole dabke in a dream and its importance by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq?

preview.html: What is the complete interpretation of seeing Dabkeh in a dream? Dabke is a type of folk dance known in many parts of the world. Dabke is widespread in the countries of the Middle East, especially Lebanon, Syria and Palestine. And Jordan. In addition to seeing the Dabkeh in a complete dream, it could be one of the visions mentioned in the dream, as many people dream in a complete dream, so we have collected for you the vision of the Dabke dance in a complete dream, such as Kamma and Dabkeh. Testimonies in a dream are full of married, elderly, and pregnant women, as well as men from the books of major scholars in interpreting dreams and visions. I dream of dancing Dabkeh. Seeing a crowded dance in a dream is generally one of the unwanted visions that indicate the bearer of misfortunes and disasters. Also, dancing Dabkeh in a dream Complete evidence that the dreamer will suffer a scandal because of which he will lose many people. If a woman sees a dancing full of pot in a dream, this speaks of a scandal between her parents and a sign of her big problems. In the same way, a dream about men means loss from trade, loss of business, and also a sign On falling into adversity.See also: Why dream of seeing a crowded dance in a dreamWhy does Dabke dream of tall women? A single woman who sees Dabke in a complete dream and dances to it is considered a sign of great exposure to many unwanted things. A girl dancing Dabke in a dream, Full of herself, it indicates the approach of happiness and joys in her life and heralds a close marriage with a person who holds a prestigious position. Dancing in mourning in a dream for a girl is complete evidence of the death of one of her relatives, and it also shows her that she will suffer from illness and sadness. See also: Why dream of seeing a drum in a dream The whole dabke in a full dream for a married woman. Dancing in a full dream for a married woman speaks of problems and fears in her family life, because it may indicate her separation from her husband. Seeing a woman dancing for her husband in full is one of the desired visions, which indicates the end of the problems between them and the stability of their marital life. I dreamed that I You wrote to say that you dreamed that the whole person was caressing you. Some interpretation researchers say that this indicates happiness and joy in his next life. It may happen that he sees a person in a dream who is completely attracted to you and intertwined with each other, which indicates that the dreamer will find a new job that will benefit him. See also: Why do you dream of seeing songs in a dream in full? Vision People dancing in a dream. Seeing joy in songs and dancing in a dream is full of unpleasant visions that Ibn Sirin said is evidence of misfortunes and misfortunes. Why dream of a darbuka? Hearing a complete darbuka in a dream indicates some obstacles and difficulties that the dreamer faces during this period of his life. See also: Why dream of seeing a darbuka? Rest in a dreamThe symbol of dancing in a dream is complete. Seeing dances in a dream is full of dreams that do not bode well, and the dreamer needs to seek forgiveness, approach God Almighty, and repent from scandalous actions. It also indicates a major decline and dissolution in the dreamer’s life, and indicates

title: A date in a dream Al-Osaimi

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of dates in Al-Osaimi’s dream, as God Almighty said in the twenty-fifth verse of Surat Maryam: “And when the trunk of a palm tree shakes you, it falls upon you wet like harvest.” There are many interpretations. Regarding the interpretation of your vision of it in a dream, and through today’s encyclopedia article, we will learn about the interpretation of seeing dates in a dream, in different situations, so follow us. Date in a dream Al-Osaimi Dr. Fahd Al-Osaimi believes that dates in a dream always lead to goodness because they are one of the types of foods mentioned in the Book of God Almighty, as well as in the Sunnah of the Prophet. He adds that dates, in general, can be an indication of the intensity of the dreamer’s faith, the extent of his practice, and his following of the path of God Almighty. Seeing dates, according to Al-Osaimi, is a sign of goodness that the dreamer acquires in reality, whether it is money or livelihood in general. Likewise, eating dates is strong evidence of goodness and abundance of livelihood for the dreamer. And if he is sick, God Almighty will heal him, and if he is honored, this is a sign of relief from God Almighty. Al-Osaimi confirms that burying dates in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is saving money and preparing for the future. Breaking dates in a dream is good news from God Almighty, that many of the wishes and dreams that the dreamer has always dreamed of will come true. If he is married, this is a sign that he will have righteous offspring, God willing. As for the one who finds in his dream that he is working in harvesting dates, this is evidence that he will obtain goodness and benefit, and he may marry a girl known for her justice and piety. For the one who cuts the core of dates in his dream, this is a sign that he will travel soon, God willing. Interpretation of dates in a dream for a single woman Seeing an appointment in a dream is a sign of kindness and abundant food that she will gain in life. Perhaps this is strong evidence that she will soon marry a righteous and righteous man. In some cases, it is a sign of achieving the desires and dreams that she has always dreamed of. But attention must be paid to the condition of the appointments, to be on time and in good condition without spoiling. Interpretation of dates in a dream For a married woman If the dates in a married woman’s dream are in good condition, this is a sign of the great good that she will receive, and the abundant money that will come into her hands in the very near future. And if a married woman finds herself removing the pulp from the dates, her dream is a sign that she will give birth to righteous offspring with her and her husband, God willing. And if he is suffering from an illness, then dating is a sign of recovery, removal of worries and problems, and enjoyment of happiness in married life. Interpretation of dates in a dream for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman finds herself eating dates in a dream, this is a sign that a male fetus will be born, God Almighty willing. In general, it is a sign of her righteous offspring and her husband, whom God Himself will recognize in the near future. This dream is also good news that she will get rid of the pains and problems of pregnancy and her simple and easy birth, after which she will be happy to see her child. Giving dates in a dream to Al-Osaimi Dr. Fahd explains that giving a date in a dream to others is a sign that

title: I dreamed that I was in a different house than mine, what does this mean?

preview.html: I dreamed that I was in a house different from my own. What does this mean? The interpretation of a dream about moving to another house or a house different from the dreamer’s house. Its interpretation varies according to the condition of the dreamer and the condition of the house. Below we will present some of the many common interpretations. I dreamed that I was in a house different from my own. A vision If a person sees in a dream that he has moved to a more beautiful house than his original home, it is a sign of kindness and abundant living. Seeing a house that is different from the dreamer’s house, but new, spacious, beautiful and tidy, this can be evidence of many positive changes in this person’s life. If a person sees That he is in a house other than his own, and this house is old, then this indicates that life’s issues do not concern this person. A person seeing that he has moved to a house other than his own and has many decorations and inscriptions, symbolizes worldliness, distance from religion, fun, and neglect in that person’s life, and he should be careful. From his actions. Whoever sees that he has moved to a house other than his own, and this house is deserted and no one lives in it, then this indicates sins and transgressions, and this person must beware and return to God. Seeing a person in a dream that he is in a house more beautiful than his own, means moving A person to something better and the beginning of a new life. Seeing a person in an old house that he changed and renovated, symbolizes that many developments and improvements will occur in his life. If a man sees that he is in a house other than his own, and the house is spacious, this indicates a great deal of livelihood. The fortune teller will get it. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a dirty house in a dream Interpretation of a dream about buying land and building a house If one sees that he is in a house other than his own, and that house is narrow, this indicates difficulties, problems, and a difficult situation. Seeing a man spraying a house other than his own in a dream may indicate To the distress and weakness that may befall him in his life. A man seeing in his dream that he is in a house other than his own, and that this house is far away, is evidence of bad behavior. If a person sees in his dream that he cannot leave any house other than his own, this is a sign that he will receive a group A wide range of good things in his life. I dreamed that I was in a house different from my house for single people. An unmarried woman sees that she is in a house different from hers, and this house was advanced, indicating her marriage to a person who lacks money and capabilities. An unmarried woman’s dream that she is in a house that is not Her house is a sign of the girl's imminent marriage. If a married woman sees that she is in a house other than her own, and that this house is new, this means that her situation will change for the better. If the house is old, this indicates the problems and crises that she and her husband will face. To see a pregnant woman That she is in a house other than her own, and that this house is spacious and comfortable, this is evidence of her safety and the safety of her baby and the ease of her birth. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a remote control device in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Dreaming of seeing a remote control in a dream A remote control in a dream means an increase in control over difficult circumstances and working to make informed decisions in order to overcome difficulties. Save time and effort, there are many uses for the remote control, including car remote control, lighting remote control and lighting remote control. The remote control is constantly evolving and works by sending and receiving. The transfer is done by pressing some buttons on the remote control and the desired purpose is achieved. Seeing the remote control or the remote control indicates control over fateful decisions, reason and wisdom. Interpretation of a dream The remote control device by Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a remote control device in a dream because it indicates a more controlled relationship. Seeing a remote control device in a dream indicates luxury and comfort. Also, seeing a remote control device in a dream means that a person He has no deception in any of life's affairs. Seeing a remote control in a dream means that the dreamer has to choose any of the alternatives available to him in a particular matter. Dreaming of seeing a remote control in a dream To see a remote control in a dream is a sign of... Quick decision making and implementation. Seeing a remote control in a dream also symbolizes a large number of opinions on a particular topic. Seeing a remote control in a dream also indicates a change in circumstances from one situation to another. Interpretation of a dream about TV: Watching TV in a dream It indicates the condition of the viewer in reality. Watching TV in a dream means that the dreamer will soon receive news and information. Dreaming of seeing a remote control in a dream or seeing a TV in a dream indicates the arrival of fears and the search for ways to remove these sorrows. Couples who watch TV and move the remote Remote control shows that there are some differences between them, but they will be eliminated soon. Watching an old TV in a dream indicates change for the better or for the worse. For a merchant who sees a TV in his dream, it means that he is not acting wisely in his business. Interpretation of a dream about a remote control in a dream Pregnant and married woman: Dreaming of seeing a remote control in a dream: Seeing a married woman far away in a dream reflects the strong connection to her husband and the strength of the relationship she has with him. Breaking the remote control reflects many problems and fears facing the wife. Seeing the remote control in A pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of natural childbirth, easy delivery, and the safety of the fetus, and it can be a sign of happiness and joy for the newborn and good relationships. Interpretation of a dream about repairing a remote control or a television in a dream and its meaning: Watching a television or a remote control in a dream in several places, wherever It was new or old, and it may need repair, indicating that there are problems on the way to being resolved. The TV or one of its tools is broken or burnt, which is

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a complete barbecue in a dream?

preview.html: Trend website offers you an interpretation of the barbecue party you dream about. In our reality, the barbecue dishes that people can visit in a dream are full. Therefore, we have provided you, dear followers, with all the testimonies and explanations about the barbecue ceremony. In a complete dream, and when the books of major scholars refer to the interpretation of dreams and visions, we have also collected for you seeing a barbecue in a complete dream, as well as an interpretation of a grill in a complete dream for the general public, married and pregnant women, as well as men. Why do Ibn Sirin’s grills dream? The scholar Ibn Sirin narrated that seeing a barbecue in a complete dream. The dream is full of good visions and a chain of transmission with money and many benefits. Also, seeing a whole roasted sheep in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will fulfill many desires in his life. Also, seeing a whole sheep in a dream means that the dreamer will get food, but not in abundance. Roasting cows promises Whole in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will achieve great profits in his work and reach the highest peaks of success. The dreamer who sees birds in a dream completely roasted indicates wealth and easy money that he will achieve without fatigue and suffering. Ibn Sirin explained that the dream of eating fried meat is evidence that the dreamer He will face a lot of worries and sorrow. Seeing a sick person grilling a whole camel in a dream is one of the desired dreams, which indicates a quick recovery from the illness. Why do poor women dream of grilling? Frying whole meat in a dream for an unmarried girl means that a fair and just man will propose to her and marry her. Eating a party Roasting a whole lamb in a dream for a single woman testifies to the positive changes that will happen to her and will change her life for the better. Roasting a whole lamb in a dream for a single woman is one of the visions that show her good and abundant money, food and success in life. Seeing whole camels in a dream means that you will enter into a relationship A successful romance that ends in a happy marriage. Why does a married woman dream of a shish kebab? Seeing a barbecue for a married woman in a dream is full of dreams that indicate that she will be showered with kindness, food, and blessings and enjoy a better life. Also, seeing a full barbecue in a dream for a woman says that she will receive a lot of money from Her husband. Seeing fried birds in a dream filled with a married woman indicates that she has obtained money illegally. Seeing a pregnant woman barbecuing in a dream is complete. A pregnant woman’s dream of barbecuing birds and chicken is a sign that she will be blessed with female offspring. Also, seeing a pregnant woman in a dream grilling sheep And whole calves mean that she was carrying a male child, and God knows what is in the womb. In a dream, O Kamel, there is roasted meat for a pregnant woman - one of the desired visions that indicates kindness and support for her life. Also, eating delicious fried meat in a full dream for a woman in late pregnancy indicates Indicating that she will endure pregnancy and childbirth without problems. Seeing a whole shish kebab in a dream for a man. Questioning a man in a dream means that he will triumph over enemies and haters and will be beneficial. A man who eats whole grilled meat in a dream indicates wealth and abundance of livelihood that he will gain.

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing travel in a dream for a single woman, seeing traveling in a dream for a single woman by car, and traveling by plane in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Young people generally have a great passion for travel, whether to complete their studies, work, or even just take a walk and explore new places, but seeing travel in a dream has many connotations for that day. We will shed light on the interpretations of seeing travel in a dream for a single woman. Seeing travel in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of seeing travel in a dream for a single woman shows that she is an ambitious person and always seeks to move from one place to another to discover new things and increase her life experiences. God knows best. As for her dream that she relies on the plane to travel somewhere, this is an indication that she has many ambitions that she seeks to reach, so you find her working hard all the time to achieve that. The dream of getting engaged in the next few days. Traveling in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of her patience in many matters of her life, and it is better not to despair, because God’s help is near. The news is close to changing the dreamer’s life radically and for the better, God willing. Seeing travel in a dream of an unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin. In the interpretation of the dream of traveling in a dream of an unmarried woman, the respected researcher showed that there is a righteous young man who is trying to propose to the priest, knowing that he will agree with him and they will live together in happiness. A single dream is a sign that she will move to a better state in her life and achieve many goals in her life. Also, traveling in a single woman’s dream is evidence of her desire to escape from the problems that surround her in her life due to their frequent presence, which makes her sleep almost safely, but there is no need. To despair because God's comfort is near no matter what. A lot of time passes and she is now on the right path that will lead her to her dreams. The specialized online dream interpretation site features a selection of the best dream and vision interpreters in the Arab world. To access it, type the dream interpretation website on the Internet on Google. The most important interpretations of seeing travel in a dream for a single woman. Seeing trips in a dream for a single woman by car. Traveling by car in an individual’s dream has many connotations, the most prominent of which are: It symbolizes progress in life and many achievements. Interpretation of the dreamer’s dream about a working woman is a guide. However, her professional position will rise in the coming days due to promotions. Ibn Shaheen believes that this dream explains that the dreamer’s life will be full of many adventures. Traveling by plane in a single woman’s dream. Traveling abroad by plane in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of the soonest date of her marriage in reality, in addition to She will live a happy life with her husband and he will have the best share in this life, God Almighty. The dream also symbolizes that she will face many obstacles and obstacles in her life, but God Almighty will bless her with enough strength to overcome them all and finally succeed in reaching her goal. If the dreamer is an employee, then traveling by plane in the dream is an indication that she will receive a new promotion in the near future, But if the dreamer is suffering from the burdens of life, then the dream promises her that her life is in the future. The days will get better

title: Interpretation of a dream about Hajj by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of Hajj in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi. Hajj is one of the five pillars of Islam that God Almighty has imposed on Muslims. It is Hajj to the House for those who are able to do this, which is one of the things that many Muslims love and strive to acquire and perform. Hence, we find that seeing Hajj in a dream They bring good news to the dreamer, and it is one of the praiseworthy dreams that they bring goodness to him, and to our lives. An article that we will learn about in the interpretation of the dream of Hajj in a dream by Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi.Interpretation of the dream of Hajj in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of the dream of Hajj includes a number of different explanations and interpretations, as they differed from one person to another depending on the social situation, in addition to the connotations and tones that appear in the dream, and among these interpretations are The interpretation of going for Hajj in a dream is generally good, except for those who see that the pilgrims are lost or missed Hajj in the dream, and the interpretation here is by Ibn Sirin. Hajj in a dream brings relief, and God Almighty is Most High and knows the unseen. Also, going to Hajj in a dream involves paying off a debt and healing from an illness, and Hajj in The dream means regaining strength and security with the journey, in addition to the fact that Hajj is relief and general guidance, and in the vision there is relief after hardship, and God knows the unseen. We find that the opposite of all of that is the interpretation of delay in performing Hajj or whoever sees that he went to Hajj and missed it. See also: Interpretation of a dream About a horse in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi. Interpretation of going for Hajj in a dream by Al-Nabulsi. The scholar Al-Nabulsi is considered one of the scholars of interpretation. It has appeared in the interpretation of many different dreams and visions. He developed a variety of interpretations related to visions of Hajj, including: Al-Nabulsi explained that Hajj in a dream indicates good deeds and good deeds. Perhaps Hajj in a dream indicates marriage, and Hajj is fair in the event for everyone, each according to his condition and fate. We find that seeing Hajj in a dream has the power of his victory over his enemy, the poor has his money, the rich man has his ability, and the seeker achieves his goal, and Hajj in a dream is the repentance of a sinner. And God knows the unseen. Going to Hajj in a dream, according to Al-Nabulsi’s opinion, is also interpreted as a means. Whoever testifies that he performed Hajj on the back of a camel is better than a woman, and whoever testifies that he performed Hajj on an elephant will perform Hajj in the company of a king, depending on the type of animal or vehicle. The sleeper sees, and God knows the unseen. Celebrating the occasion of Hajj in a dream. The majority of interpretation scholars hold that the rituals of Hajj and going to it in a dream is a praiseworthy dream that brings goodness and livelihood to the dreamer, and in our article we present to you some of them: We find that reciting the Talbiyah in a dream indicates safety from fear and victory according to the interpretation. According to Ibn Sirin, the talbiyah in a dream outside the sanctuary indicates fear. Hajj in a dream generally means uprightness in religion and a good state. Ihram in a dream is referred to as a sign of worship, such as washing, intending to fast, or the like, hearing the sound of the Talbiyah in a dream, hearing the call to prayer, and whoever testifies that he is with the pilgrims. Whoever chants the Talbiyah in a dream repeats the call to prayer, and God knows the unseen. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about a ladybug for pregnant women and single women.
